name: grope
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to feel with your hands, especially in order to find or move towards something when you cannot see easily: grope for She groped for her glasses on the bedside table.grope your way I had to grope my way up the dark stairs.
[ T ] informal to touch someone's body in order to get sexual pleasure, usually when the person does not like it: He groped me as I was going to the bar.
